responseText: He's... eccentric, some say, but his knowledge of ancient dwarven smithing techniques is reputed to be unparalleled. He's been petitioning me for resources to investigate Varnok's Forge. Varnok was a recluse, an artisan of mind-bending skill who delved into enchantments and possibly even elemental manipulation in his work.
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_CommanderThraenDunzchasm_18_Response
